languages.text: "Однажды мы вели бой за планету, почти обращенную в истинную веру. Остался лишь один бастион, войска которого укрылись за неприступными стенами, не желая присягать нам в верности. Ими руководил храбрый и талантливый генерал, не ведавший сомнений. Мои братья предлагали стереть город в порошок бомбардировками с орбиты — что нам одна крепость, когда весь мир уже под нашей пятой? Но я решил иначе".

"Once, we were fighting for a planet that was on the verge of embracing the true faith. All that stood in our way was a single bastion whose troops had hidden behind impenetrable walls, refusing to kneel before us. Their commander was a valiant and talented general, an unshakeable protector without a doubt in his heart. My brothers were ready to reduce the city to dust with an orbital bombardment — what did a single stronghold matter when we had already brought the whole planet to heel? But I decided otherwise."
languages.original_text: "Однажды мы вели бой за планету, почти обращенную в истинную веру. Остался лишь один бастион, войска которого укрылись за неприступными стенами, не желая присягать нам в верности. Ими руководил храбрый и талантливый генерал, не ведавший сомнений. Мои братья предлагали стереть город в порошок бомбардировками с орбиты — что нам одна крепость, когда весь мир уже под нашей пятой? Но я решил иначе".

Their commander was a valiant and talented general, an unshakeable protector without a doubt in his heart. My brothers were ready to reduce the city to dust with an orbital bombardment — what did a single stronghold matter when we had already brought the whole planet to heel? But I decided otherwise."

languages.text: « Autrefois, nous nous sommes battus pour une planète sur le point d'embrasser la vraie foi. Il ne nous restait plus qu'à prendre un dernier bastion dont les troupes, retranchées derrière des remparts impénétrables, refusaient de courber l'échine devant nous. Leur commandant était un général vaillant et talentueux, un protecteur inébranlable au cœur sans peur et sans reproche. Mes frères étaient prêts à réduire la ville en cendres à l'aide d'une frappe orbitale. Qu'importait une petite forteresse de rien du tout quand nous avions déjà réduit la planète entière à notre merci ? Mais j'ai décidé d'aborder le problème différemment. »
languages.original_text: "Once, we were fighting for a planet that was on the verge of embracing the true faith. All that stood in our way was a single bastion whose troops had hidden behind impenetrable walls, refusing to kneel before us. Their commander was a valiant and talented general, an unshakeable protector without a doubt in his heart. My brothers were ready to reduce the city to dust with an orbital bombardment — what did a single stronghold matter when we had already brought the whole planet to heel? But I decided otherwise."

traits.locale_text: « Autrefois, nous nous sommes battus pour une planète sur le point d'embrasser la vraie foi. Il ne nous restait plus qu'à prendre un dernier bastion dont les troupes, retranchées derrière des remparts impénétrables, refusaient de courber l'échine devant nous. Leur commandant était un général vaillant et talentueux, un protecteur inébranlable au cœur sans peur et sans reproche. Mes frères étaient prêts à réduire la ville en cendres à l'aide d'une frappe orbitale. Qu'importait une petite forteresse de rien du tout quand nous avions déjà réduit la planète entière à notre merci ? Mais j'ai décidé d'aborder le problème différemment. »

languages.text: «Una vez, luchamos por un planeta en la cúspide de aceptar la fe verdadera. Lo único que se interponía en nuestro camino era un único bastión cuyas tropas se habían refugiado tras unos muros inexpugnables, negándose a arrodillarse ante nosotros. Su comandante era un general valiente y brillante, un protector indomable sin rastro de duda en su corazón. Mis hermanos estaban listos para convertir la ciudad en cenizas con un bombardeo orbital; ¿qué importaba una sola fortaleza cuando ya habíamos tomado el resto del planeta? Pero yo tomé otra decisión».
languages.original_text: "Once, we were fighting for a planet that was on the verge of embracing the true faith. All that stood in our way was a single bastion whose troops had hidden behind impenetrable walls, refusing to kneel before us. Their commander was a valiant and talented general, an unshakeable protector without a doubt in his heart. My brothers were ready to reduce the city to dust with an orbital bombardment — what did a single stronghold matter when we had already brought the whole planet to heel? But I decided otherwise."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez, luchamos por un planeta en la cúspide de aceptar la fe verdadera. Lo único que se interponía en nuestro camino era un único bastión cuyas tropas se habían refugiado tras unos muros inexpugnables, negándose a arrodillarse ante nosotros. Su comandante era un general valiente y brillante, un protector indomable sin rastro de duda en su corazón. Mis hermanos estaban listos para convertir la ciudad en cenizas con un bombardeo orbital; ¿qué importaba una sola fortaleza cuando ya habíamos tomado el resto del planeta? Pero yo tomé otra decisión».

languages.text: 「かつて我々は、真の信仰を受け入れようとしていた惑星のために戦っていた。我々の前に立ちはだかったのは、難攻不落の城壁に隠れ、我々の前にひざまずくことを拒んだ軍隊を擁する一つの要塞だけだった。彼らの指揮官は勇敢で有能な将軍であり、疑念を抱くことのない揺るぎない守護者であった。私の兄弟たちは、軌道砲撃でこの都市を粉々にする準備ができていた。すでに惑星全体を屈服させたというのに、たった一つの要塞が何するものというのか。だが、私はそうしなかった」
languages.original_text: "Once, we were fighting for a planet that was on the verge of embracing the true faith. All that stood in our way was a single bastion whose troops had hidden behind impenetrable walls, refusing to kneel before us. Their commander was a valiant and talented general, an unshakeable protector without a doubt in his heart. My brothers were ready to reduce the city to dust with an orbital bombardment — what did a single stronghold matter when we had already brought the whole planet to heel? But I decided otherwise."

traits.locale_text: 「かつて我々は、真の信仰を受け入れようとしていた惑星のために戦っていた。我々の前に立ちはだかったのは、難攻不落の城壁に隠れ、我々の前にひざまずくことを拒んだ軍隊を擁する一つの要塞だけだった。彼らの指揮官は勇敢で有能な将軍であり、疑念を抱くことのない揺るぎない守護者であった。私の兄弟たちは、軌道砲撃でこの都市を粉々にする準備ができていた。すでに惑星全体を屈服させたというのに、たった一つの要塞が何するものというのか。だが、私はそうしなかった」

languages.text: “之前有一次，我们在某颗行星上作战，即将将真正的信仰散播至每个角落。当时，挡在我们面前的只有一座要塞，军队驻扎在牢不可破的城墙后面，不肯投降。他们的指挥官是位骁勇善战、才华横溢的将军。毫无疑问，这位守护者的意志绝对不可能动摇。当时我的兄弟们打算动用轨道轰炸，把那座城市夷为平地。毕竟我们已经征服了整颗行星，区区一个要塞又有什么关系？不过，我决定不这么做。”
languages.original_text: "Once, we were fighting for a planet that was on the verge of embracing the true faith. All that stood in our way was a single bastion whose troops had hidden behind impenetrable walls, refusing to kneel before us. Their commander was a valiant and talented general, an unshakeable protector without a doubt in his heart. My brothers were ready to reduce the city to dust with an orbital bombardment — what did a single stronghold matter when we had already brought the whole planet to heel? But I decided otherwise."

traits.locale_text: “之前有一次，我们在某颗行星上作战，即将将真正的信仰散播至每个角落。当时，挡在我们面前的只有一座要塞，军队驻扎在牢不可破的城墙后面，不肯投降。他们的指挥官是位骁勇善战、才华横溢的将军。毫无疑问，这位守护者的意志绝对不可能动摇。当时我的兄弟们打算动用轨道轰炸，把那座城市夷为平地。毕竟我们已经征服了整颗行星，区区一个要塞又有什么关系？不过，我决定不这么做。”

languages.text: "Einst kämpften wir um einen Planeten, der kurz davor stand, den wahren Glauben anzunehmen. Alles, was uns im Weg stand, war eine einzige Bastion, deren Truppen sich hinter unüberwindbaren Mauern verschanzten und sich weigerten, vor uns zu knien. Ihr Kommandeur war ein tapferer und talentierter General, ein unerschütterlicher Beschützer, dessen Herz keinerlei Zweifel kannte. Meine Brüder waren bereit, die Stadt mit einem orbitalen Bombardement in Schutt und Asche zu legen ... welche Rolle spielte schon eine einzelne Festung, nachdem wir bereits den gesamten Planeten unterjocht hatten? Aber ich entschied mich dagegen."
languages.original_text: "Once, we were fighting for a planet that was on the verge of embracing the true faith. All that stood in our way was a single bastion whose troops had hidden behind impenetrable walls, refusing to kneel before us. Their commander was a valiant and talented general, an unshakeable protector without a doubt in his heart. My brothers were ready to reduce the city to dust with an orbital bombardment — what did a single stronghold matter when we had already brought the whole planet to heel? But I decided otherwise."

traits.locale_text: "Einst kämpften wir um einen Planeten, der kurz davor stand, den wahren Glauben anzunehmen. Meine Brüder waren bereit, die Stadt mit einem orbitalen Bombardement in Schutt und Asche zu legen ... welche Rolle spielte schon eine einzelne Festung, nachdem wir bereits den gesamten Planeten unterjocht hatten? Aber ich entschied mich dagegen."

languages.text: "Bir keresinde gerçek inancı kucaklamanın eşiğinde olan bir gezegende savaşıyorduk. Yolumuzda kalan tek engel; birliklerin aşılamaz duvarlarının arkasına saklandığı, karşımızda diz çökmeyi reddeden bir hisardı. Komutanları yiğit ve yetenekli bir general; kalbinde şüphenin zerresi bulunmayan, sarsılmaz bir koruyucuydu. Kardeşlerim yörünge bombardımanıyla şehri küle çevirmeye hazırlanıyordu. Tüm gezegeni dize getirmişken tek bir kalenin ne önemi vardı ki? Bense aksi yönde karar aldım."
languages.original_text: "Once, we were fighting for a planet that was on the verge of embracing the true faith. All that stood in our way was a single bastion whose troops had hidden behind impenetrable walls, refusing to kneel before us. Their commander was a valiant and talented general, an unshakeable protector without a doubt in his heart. My brothers were ready to reduce the city to dust with an orbital bombardment — what did a single stronghold matter when we had already brought the whole planet to heel? But I decided otherwise."
